subject: College Athletics
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Pat Haden, Southern California’s athletic director, said he had spoken with the N.C.A.A. president Mark Emmert about relief from the penalties that have weighed on the program since 2010.
snippet: Pat Haden, Southern California’s athletic director, said he had spoken with the N.C.A.A. president Mark Emmert about relief from the penalties that have weighed on the program since 2010.
